name: Caldwell - Lost and Found - Pepper Cream Soda Habano - Habano Robusto
brand: Caldwell, Lost and Found, Pepper Cream Soda Habano
additionalNotes: This medium bodied cigar is made of 2014 vintage tobaccos. It features a mouthwatering Dominican HVA (Havana Vuelta Arriba seed) wrapper placed over a Dominican Criollo binder, and a filler composed of Criollo leaves of an undisclosed origin. Due to its long aging process, the Pepper Cream Soda offers a taste-quenching flavor and aroma that will not lose its fizzle from first puff to last. The Caldwell Lost & Found Pepper Cream Soda Habano Robusto is a small batch release cigar that is part of the Lost&Found project, which was founded by Robert Caldwell and Jaclyn Sears of Caldwell Cigars along with Tony Bellatto of La Barba Cigars.Â
